qa.name: Teddy
qa.appearance: Well-worn, with a missing eye and patched arm

json_to_edit.voice_over: In a world where forgotten things long to be remembered, one small bear embarks on an extraordinary journey.
json_to_edit.description: Teddy, a worn-out stuffed bear, begins his journey back home through a bustling city.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic noise, people chattering, birds chirping
json_to_edit.name: Teddy's Homeward Journey
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A forgotten stuffed bear named Teddy navigates through a busy city, determined to find his way back home.

qa.action: Teddy sits alone on a park bench, overlooking the bustling city skyline.

hf.action: Teddy's worn face, with his missing eye and stitched smile, showing determination.

tr.action: Teddy hops off the bench and begins his journey, weaving through the legs of passersby.

xc.action: Teddy cautiously crosses a busy intersection, narrowly avoiding being stepped on.

ka.action: Teddy's reflection in a puddle, distorted by ripples as he steps through it.

fn.action: Teddy climbs a small hill in a city park, pausing to look at the path ahead.

af.action: Teddy watches longingly as children play in a playground, reminded of his own child.

qo.action: Teddy's paw steps onto a familiar welcome mat, recognizing home.

fp.action: The front door opens, revealing a surprised and overjoyed child reuniting with Teddy.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every two existing shots, showing Teddy's progress from a bird's eye view. Don't change anything else.

rz.sfx_keywords: distant neighborhood sounds, faint dog barks

label.rationale: we will add new shots showing teddy's progress from a bird's eye view after every two existing shots. this will provide a broader perspective of teddy's journey through the city, enhancing the storytelling without altering the existing narrative. we'll insert these new shots while maintaining the original shot order and content. the new shots will be creative and consistent with the scene's context, showing teddy's determination and progress from above.
